articles.description: "This is a big love between the two best boxers in history," one fan said. A truly special moment between Muhammad Ali and Mike Tyson!
articles.content:
Boxing legend Muhammad Ali surprised Mike Tyson ahead of his fight and hilariously messed with him in his locker room.
Tyson, 53, was often feared for how he created an incredibly menacing aura in h… [+1679 chars]
